nodes.text: PA-717 Planetary Assault Goliath was a massive-sized Skytrooper, a battle droid used by the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. During the Invasion of Voss in 3630 BBY, it was deployed in the middle of Voss-Ka, where it was destroyed by Lana Beniko and the Alliance Commander.
PA-717 Planetary Assault Goliath appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne Chapter 1: Wrath and Ruin.
